dct_description_sm: California as an island with flat northern coast, but with Terre de Iesso nearly joining N. Mexiqve. Suggestion of D. d'Anien to north of California. Partial outline of N. Zelande and I. de Salomon. Title cartouche of simple rectangle and exterior scrollwork
Issued in 1672, with coastline of Asia unnamed and altered. The Asian strait is now labeled D. de Vriez. With Azores and I. Cayene.
Par P. DvVal Geogr. du Roy.
